function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Disproportionate impact of pandemic on learning outcomes of children of immigrants","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Severe problems for newly arrived migrant and refugee children","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Scant evidence on long-term effects such as school disengagement for children of immigrants","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Overrepresentation of students from socio-economically disadvantaged backgrounds","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Language barriers and difficulties of foreign-born parents in guiding children through host-country risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Increases in neet rates among youth, especially immigrant youth","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Disproportionately negative impact of pandemic on educational outcomes of children of immigrants","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Decreased immigration and emigration of previous immigrants","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Weak labor market attachment for refugees and family migrants","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Decline in use of posted workers during the pandemic","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Increase in labour market participation of immigrant men and women","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Movement of refugees into platform or atypical employment, such as delivery services","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Initial increase in unemployment among refugees during the first lockdown in 2020","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Immigrant women working in hard-hit service participation of migrant women in the labor market","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Increased job changes among immigrants","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Simultaneous increase in immigrant unemployment in multiple countries","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Higher participation rate of immigrant workers in specific sectors.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Increased employment rates for immigrants in certain countries","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Emigration of immigrants from certain european oecd countries","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Large declines in employment for both immigrants and native-born individuals in colombia and chile","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Immigrants are more affected by economic downturns due to less stable employment conditions and generally lower seniority at work","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Immigrants are overrepresented in sectors most affected by the pandemic, such as hospitality disproportionately strong increase in 2021","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Under-coverage of vaccination by ethnic origin due to coding errors","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Immigrants receiving vaccinations in their origin countries not being registered in the destination","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Complexity in adding vaccinations administered abroad to registers","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Significant differences in health risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Limited data on covid-19 vaccination coverage by country of birth","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Inequity in covid-19 vaccination coverage between native-born and foreign-born individuals","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Non-adjustment for vaccinations administered abroad in register-based vaccination rates","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Excess mortality of immigrants due to covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Higher excess mortality linked to socio-demographic characteristics","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Communication barriers contributing to excess mortality","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Overrepresentation of immigrants among inpatients in oecd countries due to covid-19","category":"Public
